Donations Agreement

By submitting donation to Official L2Advanced you agree that you are NOT entitled to receive anything from us! Rewards list can be found in www.L2Advanced.com You can donate with multiple ways like: Paypal , PaySafeCard , WebMoney , Western Union & Bank Wire Transfer.
Steps how to donate:

In order to make a donation you need to contact us first at Lineage2AvA@gmail.com. After you tell us with what method you would like to donate, we give you the details to make the transaction. There will be Auto Donation System, and you can get reward in 5 minutes after you donated with commmand .donate $email. Example how to type in chat when donation is done: .donate lineage2ava@gmail.com
Contact Staff Info:
